original_definition: 'cycle' means a complete drying process, as defined for the selected programme;
generated_definition: 'cycle' means the period of time during which a process or activity occurs or is carried out, typically consisting of a series of stages or phases.

Article 2: ‘condensation efficiency’ means the ratio between the mass of moisture condensed by a condenser tumble drier and the mass of moisture removed from the load at the end of a cycle;

Article 10: (1)  ‘Rated value’ means a value that is declared by the supplier. The 6 % uncertainty in the measurement represent the current acceptable testing laboratory error in measuring the declared parameters with the new measurement method used for the new labelling/ecodesign requirements including full and partial load cycles.
